thread.title: Dollar Tree Sheds As Sales Miss With Family Dollar
thread.title_full: Dollar Tree Sheds As Sales Miss With Family Dollar

title: Dollar Tree Sheds As Sales Miss With Family Dollar
text:
Stocks Plunge, Wiping Out Much Of Rebound 
The stock market suffered a relapse Tuesday, as sellers returned in droves. The Nasdaq plunged 2.9% and the S&P 500 3%. Both closed near session lows, and roughly two-thirds of last week's three-day rally has been erased. The week before Labor Day may be traditionally slow on Wall Street, but ... 06:31 PM ET Stocks Plunge 3% On Fresh China Fears; Dollar Tree Falls On Q2 
Stocks sold off into the close, falling for the eighth time in the last 11 sessions Tuesday. According to preliminary numbers volume was sharply higher across the board. The Nasdaq closed down 2.9% and the S&P 500 fell 3%, while the Dow Jones industrial average sank 2.8%. Nearly every industry ... 04:19 PM ET Stocks Off Worst Levels; Ambarella Slides Ahead Of Earnings 
Stocks were off their lows, but still carried big losses near midday Tuesday. Weak economic data out of China and elsewhere are weighing on U.S. stocks. The S&P 500 slumped 1.7% and the Nasdaq lost 1.3%. They were off by as much as 2.4% and 2.3% at Tuesday's low. The Dow Jones industrial ... 11:46 AM ET Stocks Crumble In Fast Trade; Exxon, Ambarella, Netflix Hit 
Stocks tumbled hard and in heavy trade at the open Tuesday. The Dow and the S&P 500 shed 2% apiece. The Nasdaq was down 1.7%. Retailers, oil producers and consumer electronics makers were among the worst early losses. Volume swelled — an unusual event in the week ahead of the Labor Day ... 10:35 AM ET Stock Futures Take A Beating; Dollar Tree, Ambarella Slide 
Weak overseas data kicked global investors into a selling mood Tuesday, sending stock futures sharply lower in the U.S. Dow futures swooned 353 points below fair market value. Nasdaq 100 futures were more than 100 points lower. S&P 500 futures traded down 43.6 points. Small caps were hard hit, ... 09:02 AM ET Planet Fitness Stock Trading Up Ahead Of Q2 Earnings 
The financial fitness of Planet Fitness (NYSE:PLNT) will be revealed when the company presents its first earnings report since coming public last month. Planet Fitness, one of the largest and fastest-growing franchisers and operators of fitness centers in the U.S., will report second-quarter ... 06:12 PM ET Under Armour Stock Shows Strength In Market Turmoil 
Under Armour (NYSE:UA) stock showed strength amid Tuesday's market turmoil, holding above a key level — the 50-day moving average — while bigger peer Nike (NYSE:NKE) broke support at that line. Under Armour ended down 2.5% in slightly above-average volume in the stock market today. But ... 05:52 PM ET Netflix PT Hiked; CyberArk, American, Delta Upgraded 
Analysts are still bullish on Netflix (NASDAQ:NFLX) a day after reports said Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) is looking into original programming. Bank of America (NYSE:BAC) raised Netflix's price target to 133 from 121 on Tuesday and kept its buy rating on the stock. Netflix shares plunged 8% to close at ... 04:36 PM ET How Exporting U.S. Oil Could Cut Fuel Prices Further 
Lifting the four-decade ban on U.S. crude oil exports would boost the U.S. economy and could help lower gasoline prices, the Energy Department said, echoing what economists have being saying for years and boosting support for removing the ban. The export ban started in the 1970s as an attempt to ... 04:26 PM ET Monster Truck Rally Crushes Small Cars Amid Low Oil 
U.S. drivers continued to veer toward gas-guzzling pickups and SUVs in August, steering clear of small fuel-efficient cars as gasoline prices remained low. Sales of Ford's (NYSE:F) compact Focus sank 26% for the month, but truck sales including the F-150 rose 11.3% and SUVs climbed 12%. The Mustang ... 04:21 PM ET
